naslov: Kuća, Jesenice Mali rat, 450m2 -12 soba, pogled na more, 150m od plaže (prodaja)
opis: EXSCLUSIVNA PRODAJA!! NOVO U PONUDI Na prekrasnoj Omiškoj rivijeri u mjestu Jesenice, Mali rat, prodaje se kuća sa fantastičnim pogledom na more. Kuća se nalazi na terenu od 582 m2, 100 m od magistrale i 150 m od mora i plaže. Sama kvadratura kuće iznosi po koeficijentima 450m2, a sastoji se od: - Podrum sa garažom za 2 automobila i velikom ostavom s druge strane, kao i teretanom ukupno 80 m2 + roštilj kućica i terasa od 100m2 iznad. - Prizemlje na kojem se nalazi veliki komforni 2-soban stan od 115m2, sa 2 spavaće sobe, 1 kupatilo, 2 WC i otvorenim prostorom za dnevni boravak, kuhinju i blagovaonicu sa 2 izlaza na terasu - moguće koristiti kao dio za doručak ili/i večeru, ako se otvori pansion. - I kat 5 soba svaka sa pripadajućom mini kuhinjom i kupatilom, kao i balkonom od 6 m2 sa otvorenim pogledom na more i otok Brač - II 5 soba svaka sa pripadajućom mini kuhinjom i kupatilom, kao i balkonom od 6 m2 sa otvorenim pogledom na more i otok Brač Cijela kuća je okrenuta na južnu stranu i svaki prostor unutrašnji i vanjski ima pogled na more. Ispred ulaza je moguće parkirati još 1 automobil. Sa zapadne strane postoji vrt gdje se može napraviti bazen, a postojeća teretana se može iskoristiti kao prostor za aparaturu grijaćeg bazena. Izvrsna prilika kao investicija u turizam sa mogućnosšću otvaranja mini hotela/bed and breakfast/polupanisona. Vlasništvo uredno, bez tereta. EXCLUSIVE SALE!! NEW ON OFFER On the beautiful Omiš riviera in Jesenice, Mali rat, a house with a fantastic sea view is for sale. The house is located on a plot of 582 m2, 100 m from the highway and 150 m from the sea and the beach. According to the coefficients, the square footage of the house is 450m2, and it consists of: - Basement with a garage for 2 cars and a large storage room on the other side, as well as a gym totaling 80 m2 + a barbecue house and a terrace of 100 m2 above. - The ground floor, where there is a large comfortable 2-room apartment of 115m2, with 2 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms and an open space for living room, kitchen and dining room with 2 exits to the terrace - can be used as a part for breakfast and/or dinner, if the boarding house opens. - First floor, 5 rooms, each with its own kitchenette and bathroom, as well as a balcony of 6 m2 with an open view of the sea and the island of Brač - Second floor, 5 rooms, each with its own kitchenette and bathroom, as well as a balcony of 6 m2 with an open view of the sea and the island of Brač The whole house faces the south side and every space inside and outside has a view of the sea. It is possible to park 1 more car in front of the entrance. On the west side, there is a garden where a swimming pool can be built, and the existing gym can be used as a space for the heating pool equipment. An excellent opportunity as an investment in tourism with the possibility of opening a mini-hotel/bed and breakfast/half board. Ownership neat, no encumbrances.
